attributes.long-description:
Challenge your friends and family to this authentic Pool experience, with intuitive controls and a huge range of features.

Featuring a host of colourful characters and realistic match environments, Pool Hall Pro™ allows you to use your mastery of the baize to unlock hundreds of items and kit to create your own private games Crib!

KEY FEATURES
• Multiplayer gaming for up to 4 players; show your custom crib off to your friends before beating them to the black!
• Authentic simulated pool experience
• 11 game rule types – including 6 different pool games, 4 snooker games and billiards
• Extensive player rewards – unlock new game venues, equipment, outfits, trophies and game modes
• 22 vibrant high detail match venues - fully animated with action around the environments as well as on the table

Copyright ©2010 Icon Games Entertainment Ltd.

attributes.name: Pool Hall Pro™
